data.text: @1978HUN @jsuzuki76 @Birdyword Just how big is this 🪨  you are living under
@JShijiu @veravelfalsa @VJMallet @ghleather77 @Birdyword @AsAslifeas The world leaders are infested with sick, evil MFs. The human race doesn’t seem to have evolved much in the last 2000 years.

@count_zatara @mildnhazy @stewak2 @Birdyword HKs average demographic age and population density is very high. Any outbreak of a very transmissible variant like omicron would expectedly run through the population quickly. Like with a lot of other countries, omicron might be less deadly, but mass infection leads to mass death

@AsAslifeas @VJMallet @ghleather77 @Birdyword Agree with gov had and has priorities and should take burden of blame. I am just saying that massive anti-vax drive as anti-govt coupled with media exaggerations had a huge impact too. 

I thought I just learned from west that staying silent means “support”!

@Birdyword Number of factors could be at play. HKs average demographic age is very high. HKs population density is also very high. HKs low vaccine uptake in some populations could also be from a fundamental distrust of gov which isn't unfounded considering the riots from 3 years ago.
